# Alert.Button

**Structure**

A button that represents an operation of an alert presentation.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Button
```

## Getting a button

- **default(_:action:)**: Creates an alert button with the default style.
- **cancel(_:)**: Creates an alert button that indicates cancellation, with a system-provided label.
- **cancel(_:action:)**: Creates an alert button that indicates cancellation, with a custom label.
- **destructive(_:action:)**: Creates an alert button with a style that indicates a destructive action.

items.description: Creates an alert button with the default style.
items.name: default(_:action:)

items.description: Creates an alert button that indicates cancellation, with a system-provided label.
items.name: cancel(_:)

items.description: Creates an alert button that indicates cancellation, with a custom label.
